column3: School of Natural and Computing Sciences
column5: If you are from a computing background or you have a degree and a lot of skills within computing already this programme is a great way to quickly advance your skills in a highly employable range of careers in a growth area that shows no sign of stopping.
column7: Find out about fees: abdn.ac.uk/study/international/tuition-fees-and-living-costs-287.php  View course fees on the programme page
column9: 1 Year Full Time, 2 Years 3 Months or 6 Months Part Time
